title.narrative: Consultation Visits to HYPREP And NOSDRA

description.narrative: CEHRD undertook a consultation visit to HYPREP and NOSDRA in Rivers and Bayelsa State which are the two regulatory agencies focused on the clean-up of environment and the wider remediation of polluted sites in the Niger Delta region. Precisely CEHRD visits to NOSDRA in Rivers and Bayelsa States was to introduce the project and outline the project objectives and desire for stakeholder’s in particular civil society organizations to achieve a sustainable clean-up of the Niger Delta starting from Ogoniland.
